title: Suspect returned home for the holidays weeks after the crime. Here's what we know about him
description: The man arrested in connection with the November killings of four University of Idaho students who were found stabbed to death attended a nearby university in Washington state and traveled across the country in December to spend the holidays with his parents.

title: Former Pope Benedict XVI dies age 95
See countries around the world ring in 2023 with a bang
description: From Hong Kong to Abu Dhabi, with fireworks and cheers, watch how the New Year was celebrated around the globe.

title: Queen guitarist Brian May is now a knight
description: Queen guitarist Brian May has received a knighthood in honor of his services to music and charity.

title: Sophie Turner shows off baby bump in adorable Instagram throwback
description: It's never too late for more bump photos.

title: In pictures: New Year's celebrations around the world
Zelensky says Russia waging war so Putin can stay in power 'until the end of his life'
description: Ukrainian Prime Minister Denys Shmyhal said Moscow wants to cause darkness and leave the country "in the dark for the New Year," as deadly strikes swept several regions on Saturday.

title: All of the moments and discoveries that provided us with wonder in 2022
description: This year was full of moments that remind us why we look at the stars and dig into the past.

title: New details emerge about suspect arrested for Idaho killings
description: New details are emerging about 28-year-old Bryan Kohberger, the suspect arrested for the killings of four University of Idaho students. CNN's Camila Bernal has the story.

title: At least five explosions rock Kyiv, killing one and leaving nearly a dozen wounded
Kyiv explosions on New Year's Eve kill one, leave nearly a dozen wounded
CNN's top 100 digital stories of 2022
description: 2022 was not just another year that tried patience and frayed nerves, it was historic and deadly. Russian President Vladimir Putin did what was unimaginable to many, launching the largest land war in Europe since World War II. All too common horrors were unleashed once more on American schoolchildren in Uvalde, Texas, and in many, many other mass shootings in the United States. And, inevitably, luminaries who brought light to our lives were extinguished.

title: Buccaneers quarterback Blaine Gabbert helped rescue family from a helicopter crash via jet ski
description: Tampa Bay Buccaneers quarterback Blaine Gabbert used jet skis to help rescue the occupants of a helicopter after it crash landed in the water on Thursday, he said in a press conference on Friday.

title: Will 'The Witcher: Blood Origin' leave you spellbound?
description: Full disclosure: I'm off thoroughly enjoying this down week between Christmas and New Year's.

title: Millennials like me turned 40 this year. Everything you think you know about us is wrong
description: For years I believed a lot of what I heard about millennials -- those avocado-toast eating, latte-guzzling, selfie-taking narcissists who still live in their parents' basements and can't get their lives together.

title: Snoop Dogg says this singer 'out-gangstered' him
description: Gangsta rap dominated the music scene in the '90s, and then one legendary singer's intervention forever changed the genre.

title: Unanswered questions about Trump's tax returns
description: After years of legal battles, pontificating and theorizing, former President Donald Trump's tax returns from 2015 to 2020 are now part of the public record. Many critics and political opponents have theorized that Trump fought the public disclosure of his tax returns because they potentially provided evidence of illegal or politically damaging behavior.

title: Juvenile warrant issued for 17-year-old charged with second-degree murder in Mall of America shooting
description: Minnesota prosecutors have charged a 17-year-old with second-degree murder and second-degree assault in connection with a deadly shooting at the Mall of America.

title: Meet the team behind CNN's 'New Year's Eve Live'
description: Every New Year's Eve, Anderson Cooper and Andy Cohen host four-and-a-half hours of live television, joined by celebrity guests and performers, as they count down to the new year.

title: Magnus Carlsen becomes triple world champion for the third time in his career
description: Magnus Carlsen won both the World Rapid and World Blitz chess titles in Almaty, Kazakhstan, in the latest landmark of his glittering career.

title: Santos voters speak to CNN after his false claims were revealed
description: CNN's Eva McKend spoke to people who voted for Republican New York Rep.-elect George Santos after it was revealed he fabricated parts of his resume.

title: How to watch (and enjoy) this year's College Football Playoff games
description: Don't have any New Year's plans? Yes you do! The NCAA College Football Playoff games are on, and nothing says "glamor" or "party time" like eight straight hours of televised sports. Plus, the two semifinal games on December 31 will determine the match-up for the College Football Playoff Championship game on January 9, and you don't want to miss any important lore. Here's everything you could possibly want to know to enjoy this year's playoffs events.

title: LeBron James scores season-high 47 points on 38th birthday
description: LeBron James knows how to celebrate in style, scoring a season-high 47 points as he inspired the Los Angeles Lakers to a 130-121 win over the Atlanta Hawks on his 38th birthday.

title: Cities strengthen security ahead of return of crowded New Year's Eve celebrations
description: Major cities including New York and Chicago are preparing for New Year's Eve celebrations, and part of the festivity preparations will include strengthened security measures.

title: The 'sexy' reality behind Sicily's 'White Lotus' hotel
description: With lavish Baroque villas, exotic gardens, dramatic landscapes, ancient art and a seductive vibe, Sicily seems to be the perfect location for season two of dark comedy series "The White Lotus."

title: CNN Sports' top stories of 2022
description: From a World Cup like no other in Qatar to Ukrainian athletes returning home to fight in the war against Russia, CNN Sport has picked out the must-read stories from the last 12 months.

title: Pelé's final hurrah at New York Cosmos helped spark 'sporting revolution' across North America
description: He'd won three World Cups, scored goals galore and become a global icon, but Pelé wasn't quite done yet, so off he went to the US and helped transform the sport of soccer in North America.

title: Best of 2023: New design hotels and luxury train routes coming soon
description: This was a bad, bad week for holiday travelers in the United States. First there was the raging storm that caught many people in perilous situations far from home: Here are some of their stories. Then Southwest went into an almighty days-long meltdown that left hundreds of thousands of passengers delayed or stranded. Insiders blame it on outdated tech.

title: In pictures: The life of Benedict XVI
description: Produced by CNN Digital's Photo Team

title: US Mega Millions drawing produces no winner, jackpot grows to $785 million
description: There was no jackpot winner in Friday night's Mega Millions drawing, which means the top prize will rise to an estimated $785 million dollars on Tuesday night.

title: World reacts to the death of former Pope who influenced Catholic doctrine for years
World reacts to death of former Pope who influenced Catholic doctrine for years
Former Pope Benedict XVI dies age 95
description: Benedict XVI, the Pope Emeritus, has died in Vatican City at the age of 95 following a period of ill health.

title: 'God's Rottweiler': Benedict shaped Catholic doctrine but faced criticism for handling of sexual abuse crisis
description: Pope Emeritus Benedict XVI, whose death at 95 was announced Saturday, was a powerful intellectual force who shaped the Catholic Church's theology for more than a quarter century before shocking the world by resigning in 2013.

title: Follow the New Year around the world
description: Get out of your East Coast mentality, America. Not everyone starts their New Year when you do.

title: The 20 best destinations for New Year's Eve celebrations in 2022
description: From world-famous cities to lesser-known locations, these are the best places on the planet to welcome the New Year, offering everything from stunning fireworks displays and all-night parties to breathtaking views and traditional festivals.

title: The full lyrics to 'Auld Lang Syne' so you don't mumble your way through it
description: As the clock strikes midnight on New Year's Eve, voices all over the world will resurrect the centuries-old tradition of singing "Auld Lang Syne" to say goodbye to the passing year.

title: Authorities tracked student killings suspect as he drove cross-country, sources say
description: • A timeline of the killings of four University of Idaho students

title: Here's what's giving people hope for 2023
description: 2022 hasn't always been an easy year. But, as it comes to an end, people from around the world have been telling CNN what's giving them hope for 2023 - from their own exciting plans, to potential scientific breakthroughs, and the promise of the next generation. Here are their stories.

title: 'We're trapped': Britons in homes with unsafe cladding see no way out as living costs soar
description: In May 2017, Sophie Bichener did what many in their twenties are unable to do: buy a home. She paid around £230,000 (around $295,000 at the time) for her two-bedroom apartment in a high-rise building in a town north of London, where a train could get her to work in the capital in less than half an hour. She had her foot on the first rung of Britain's housing ladder, an increasingly difficult feat, and it felt like the only way was up.

title: Women and nonbinary photographers capture 2022
description: By Eliza Anyangwe and Laura Oliverio, CNN

title: Barbara Walters, legendary news anchor, has died at 93
description: Barbara Walters, the pioneering TV journalist whose interviewing skills made her one of the most prominent figures in broadcasting, has died, her spokesperson confirmed to CNN. She was 93.

title: New light cast on world's best-selling living female artist's seven-decade career
description: Advanced age and the pandemic have done little to deter Japan's Yayoi Kusama. At 93, the world's best-selling living female artist is still painting daily at the psychiatric hospital she voluntarily checked into and has lived in since the 1970s.

title: Banning sex outside marriage tests Indonesia's relationship with democracy
description: When Indonesia passed controversial amendments to its criminal code earlier this month, one aspect above all others dominated the headlines: the criminalization of sex outside marriage.

title: Cristiano Ronaldo signs for Saudi team Al Nassr
description: Famed Portuguese footballer Cristiano Ronaldo has joined Saudi Arabian club Al Nassr, the team announced on social media Friday.
